com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager

Interface BeaconManager.MonitoringListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BeaconManager

    public static interface BeaconManager.MonitoringListener
    Monitoring listener provides callbacks for monitoring process performed by Beacon Manager (BeaconManager).

    Please note that when using Monitoring listener the callback methods are invoked in thread different from UI thread.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BeaconManager.MonitoringListener NULL_MONITORING_LISTENER
      The NULL_MONITORING_LISTENER is part of Beacon Manager Null configuration (BeaconManager.Configuration).

      • onRegionAbandoned

        void onRegionAbandoned(Region region)
        Called when device abandoned given region. In other words, when during active monitoring period no beacon propagating region proximity UUID will be found, the region will be recognized as exited.
        Parameters:
        region - the region
